patterns.title: > INTEGRATION_PATTERNS
patterns.subtitle: Standardized visual blueprints for enterprise connectivity.

design.title: EDI Transaction Set Design: Best Practices for X12 & EDIFACT
design.p1: Proper EDI transaction set design is critical for ensuring interoperability between trading partners. Here are proven strategies for building robust EDI implementations.
design.p2: While X12 and EDIFACT standards allow for optional segments and elements, resist the urge to create highly customized transaction sets. Stick to industry-standard implementation guides whenever possible.

api.title: RESTful API Design Patterns for Integration Platforms

event.title: Event-Driven Integration: Pub/Sub vs. Message Queue Patterns
event.p1: Event-driven architectures enable loose coupling and real-time data synchronization across distributed systems. Understanding when to use publish/subscribe vs. message queues is crucial.
event.design_p3_desc: Store events as source of truth for system state

transformation.p1: Bridging legacy systems and modern APIs requires sophisticated data transformation logic. These strategies minimize technical debt while ensuring data integrity.

error.p3: Design integrations to handle duplicate messages safely. Store processed message IDs in a cache/database and skip already-processed messages. This enables safe retries without data corruption.

webhook.title: Webhook Inspector - Server Required
webhook.desc: A webhook inspector requires a backend server to receive and store HTTP requests. Since this is a static site, this tool is not available in the browser.

insights.title: Technical Insights
insights.subtitle: Whitepapers, architectural decisions, and code snippets.

erp.title: Netsuite ERP Integration
erp.desc: Leveraging SuiteTalk (SOAP/REST) for external connectivity. Strategies for syncing Orders and Inventory using User Event Scripts and Map/Reduce jobs.

modern.title: Modernizing Legacy EDI
modern.desc: Strategies for wrapping legacy X12/EDIFACT systems with modern RESTful layers to allow microservices usage while properly handling translation.

gateway.title: Secure B2B Gateways
gateway.desc: Implementing robust AS2 and SFTP gateways. Advanced security protocols including mTLS and payload encryption for mission-critical data.
